segments.text: Spring Festival is the most important festival in China , isn't it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It depends.But usually it's about 15 days .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you eat any special food for the festival ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , dumpling is a must.There is also other food.For example , people eat chicken for good luck .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's interesting . I'm told the Chinese firework is very beautiful , isn't it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , great ! I hope I can spend this Spring Festival with you here in Beijing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sure you'll have a good time .
segments.speaker: S2
